## How to generate Image Animation:


#### 1. Upload an image in the "Input Image" group.

#### 2. Set your desired video length in seconds

#### 3. Adjust the Output FPS (if desired)

#### 4. Un-bypass different Preset/Component Motion groups below to achieve various effects and animations. You can adjust the intensity values to get stronger motion.

#### 5. (Optional) Tweak the "edge_fix" value if there is artifacting around the edges of objects.

#### 6. Generate

---


## How to generate Video/GIF Animation:

#### 1. Un-bypass the Video Input group, and bypass the Image Input group.

#### 2. Upload a video/gif to the "Load Video" node.

#### 3. Adjust the Output FPS (if desired)

#### 4. Un-bypass different Preset/Component Motion groups below to achieve various effects and animations. You can adjust the intensity values to get stronger motion.

#### 5. (Optional) Tweak the "edge_fix" value if there is artifacting around the edges of objects.

#### 6. Generate
